title: Sagamore Hill National Historic Site: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia Presentations       Rose Parade Video Theodore Roosevelt and the 2016 Rose Parade  Sagamore Hill Podcasts Episode 001: Race Relations during the Presidency of Theodore Roosevelt Episode 002: The Women's Rights Movement during the Presidency of Theodore Roosevelt Episode 003: The Life and Death of Quentin Roosevelt Episode 004: Theodore Roosevelt and His Historical Assessment on US Presidents Episode 005: The Teddy Bear: An American Pop Culture Icon Episode 006: Theodore Roosevelt in Advertising  Â                      Sagamore Hill: Inside the Roosevelt Family Home Guided tour of Sagamore Hill NHS  Duration:16 minutes, 49 seconds                 Audio Sound Bytes Social and Industrial Justice-August 1912
